title: "Apply now"
body_html:
If you click "apply now", there should come a site that shows the things you can do:

  • Read the application guide first
  • Only teams can send applications. Create a team now (if they don't have created a team yet)
  • Apply now (if they already have a team)
body_text:
If you click "apply now", there should come a site that shows the things you can do:

Read the application guide first
Only teams can send applications. Create a team now (if they don't have created a team yet)
Apply now (if they already have a team)
body:
If you click "apply now", there should come a site that shows the things you can do:
- Read the [application guide](http://railsgirlssummerofcode.org/students/application/) first 
- Only teams can send applications. [Create a team](https://teams.railsgirlssummerofcode.org/teams/new) now (if they don't have created a team yet)
- [Apply now](LINK) (if they already have a team)
